works.description:
I wrote a page on Squidoo with information on the upcoming movie Snow White and the Huntsman. This other site has my exact same information copied and pasted to it. They stole from two different sections of my page. The two beginning lines of each section are below.

Text beginning, "Snow White and the Huntsman is a new, grown-up take on the classic fairy tale...."

Text beginning, "A remade version of the Brothers Grimm fairytale..."
